GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v6.0.12
GSD.description:
iio: health: afe4403: Fix oob read in afe4403_read_raw

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.12 by commit 06c6ce21cec77dfa860d57e7a006000a57812efb, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit b36e8257641a043764c62240316610c81e36376c. For more details please see the references link.
